ygData.subject: Down aboout yer sk? Read On.
ygData.msgSnippet: Listen here, I quit my sk about 8 times.. keep comin back.. I mm now level 17. Why ppl suck with their sk is because they misuyse him.. He is not a
ygData.messageBody:
Listen here,
I quit my sk about 8 times.. keep comin back.. I'mm now level 17. Why ppl
suck with their sk is because they misuyse him.. He is not a spellcaster..
he is not a tank. Tank.. Use yer pet fer extra damage(not to aabsorb) Blast
all yer mana with what spells you have. Combined.. you are a monster. So you
cant heal.. neither can mages or straight warriors, rogues, monks. were not
alone. If you want to heeal.. be a cleric, see how fun that is. the SK can
do more than most any other class save ranger and paladin. Use all your
facets to their full extent. Currently, I am in unrest at level 17 tanking
for higher level players. Al lthey need is my ac and decent hp's to heep teh
beasties busy.. All these beasties are red to me but with a solid group, i
never get below 3 bubbles and, i have made 7- plat and 5 bubbles of exp ind
one night. Shadowknights arent easy. It says in the creation and everey
website thay are. While i do agree we are underpowered comparatively, we are
not useless.

I have been a welcome addition to many parties and continue to gain riches,
fame and levels.

Krimzin
Tarew Maar
17th level Dark Elf Sk
